p: Nigellothionin NsW2 was selected for further functional analysis because its amount was sufficient. The selected nigellothionin was tested against several clinical isolates of Aspergillus and Candida, which are causative agents of invasive aspergillosis and candidiasis of patients with pulmonary tuberculosis. The disc-diffusion method at the active concentration of 19.4 ÂµM (~1 nmol/per disc; Figure 3) was used.
